Description.Text: This four-star hotel is considered a first-class property. It is ideal for clients looking for comfort and good services, coupled with a central location. (1008IU)

The hotel is situated in a small street, a few minutes walk from the Opera and the main department stores, such as Printemps and Lafayette Galeries. It is a very lively district, with picturesque restaurants and prestigious shops. It takes only 5 minutes by metro to the Champs Elysees and 40 minutes to Eurodisney.
The small to medium-sized rooms are of a good standard, well-equipped and air-conditioned. They are tastefully decorated in pleasant colours and refurbished with elegant furniture.
The hotel is an elegant, Parisian house, built in Haussmann style.
The breakfast room is spacious and welcoming, with colourful decor and good quality furniture. For lunch and dinner, guests can find an impressive choice of restaurants a few steps from the hotel.

The lobby is medium in size, open plan with a lounge and a bar area. The decor is very bright, with tiled floors, pleasant colours and many lights. It is also furnished to a very good standard. Pictures on the walls and green plants give a touch of elegance to public areas.
